SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, LEAD(alarmstate) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmstate, LEAD(time) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmtime, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF1' THEN '1호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF2' THEN '2호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF3' THEN '3호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF4' THEN '4호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF5' THEN '5호기' ELSE 'DONGHWA' END AS alarmGroupLabel FROM ALARMDATA WHERE 1=1
AND time BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} ORDER BY time ) AS aa WHERE 1=1 AND alarmstate = 'Warning' AND lead_alarmstate = 'Clear' ORDER BY time DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, LEAD(alarmstate) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmstate, LEAD(time) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmtime, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF1' THEN '1호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF2' THEN '2호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF3' THEN '3호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF4' THEN '4호기' WHEN SUBSTR(alarmgroup, 1, 4) = 'CCF5' THEN '5호기' ELSE 'DONGHWA' END AS alarmGroupLabel FROM ALARMDATA WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY time ) AS aa WHERE 1=1 AND alarmstate = 'Warning' AND lead_alarmstate = 'Clear' ORDER BY time DESC limit 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, LEAD(alarmstate) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmstate, LEAD(time) OVER (PARTITION BY tagname ORDER BY time) AS lead_alarmtime FROM ALARMDATA WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY time ) AS aa WHERE 1=1 AND alarmstate = 'Warning' and lead_alarmstate is null ORDER BY time DESC;
